entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use consistent naming scheme for properties #39310
  • `dotnet user-secrets edit` #39307
  • `UseWindowsForms` causes token `Windows` to be clobbered in global scope. #39299
  • RID in .toolsetversion is wrong #39288

Closed

  • OSX/Linux SDK includes Windows containerize.exe apphost #39289

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update TestAsTool builds to use 1ES pools #39308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry pick extensions fix #39306
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove unnecessary RemoveMSDiaTypeLib target from GenerateLayout.targets #39304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39291
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Only include containerize.csproj and net472 tasks on Windows SDK layouts #39303
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.129 #39219
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS for Razor #39302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.421 #39220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Compress all assets by default #39213
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Set UseAppHost=false in containerize.csproj #39290
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0.2xx] make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39267
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
